Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Widen \Wid"en\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Widened}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Widening}.] To make wide or wider; to extend in breadth; to increase the width of; as, to widen a field; to widen a breach; to widen a stocking. [1913 Webster]
